name: Trillions of Resources in Apocalypse
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: Constantly slapping faces is constantly satisfying. Holding trillions in resources, slapping the faces of terrible women, conquering goddesses, Chen Yu is bound to the Scumbag System, sweeping away all powerful enemies in the apocalypse, and subduing countless otaku goddesses!Original Webtoon
